net.hudup.data.bit

Class BitData

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.data.bit.BitData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, AutoCloseable

    public class BitData
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cloneable, AutoCloseable
    This class represents a rating matrix in bit form. It is also a bit dataset.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

      • toItemPairList

        public java.util.List<Pair> toItemPairList(java.util.BitSet bs)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: AutoCloseable
        The main method of this interface, which is responsible for releasing resources occupied by auto-closable object. The finalize() method of auto-closable class should call AutoCloseable.close() method so that AutoCloseable.close() method is called automatically before the Java garbage collector destroys auto-closable object.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any error raises.
